summary:
Vanilla Nightingale Armor for use with Cherry Hotaling\'s CHSBHC mod (breast physics).
ENJOY!
For Female Model Only.
descriptionHtml:
For use with Cherry Hotalings CHSBHC mod, if you don\'t have it, go here to download & install:
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4888


This is just a pair of edited mesh files, any applied texture mods should be compatible, provided they don\'t utilize transparency.

Many thanks to Cherry\'s help!!

============
A Few Notes
============

The actual physics is restricted as if the character was actually wearing the armor, that is, to say her boobs have support!  This was intentional!   If people REALLY don\'t like it I can tweak the weighting, but I thought it looked better this way.

The heavier mesh has thicker armor ridges, as I was struggling to maintain the sense of armor, so no you\'re not fat, you\'re just well endowed & well protected.

There is no underlying body in this version, if the need for a body arises  ( IE Transparency mods), contact me and I\'ll see what I can do.  I was attempting to insert one, but it wound up being more trouble that it was worth at the time.

Not sure if breast wiggles is classified as adult-only...

-----------
Known Issues
-----------

Your amulet disappears when the weight slider is maxed. This is due to epic boobs and is unavoidable.
author: White Rabbit
